<title level="1" right="Trait">[Detection](/Traits.aspx?ID=43)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 630 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Effects with this trait attempt to determine the presence or location of a person, object, or aura.
name: Detection
